subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Two nights after being blown out by 30 points in Miami, the Nets snapped back with a 107-68 rout of the Magic that momentarily calmed the nerves of an antsy team.
snippet: Two nights after being blown out by 30 points in Miami, the Nets snapped back with a 107-68 rout of the Magic that momentarily calmed the nerves of an antsy team.
